title: How to do element wise operation for two Tensors?
body_html: Say, I have two Tensors A and B, both with shape [-1, m, d]. How could I get a Tensor C with shape [-1, m*(m-1)/2, d] so than C_ij = A_i + B_j? Where + is an element wise addition. I know there is an element-wise operation named tf.add, but how should I use it? Thanks a lot.
body_text: Say, I have two Tensors A and B, both with shape [-1, m, d]. How could I get a Tensor C with shape [-1, m*(m-1)/2, d] so than C_ij = A_i + B_j? Where + is an element wise addition. I know there is an element-wise operation named tf.add, but how should I use it? Thanks a lot.
